#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

#define MAXN 1005
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,m) for(i=0;i<m;i++)
#define ll long long
#define INF 1000000010
long long a[MAXN][MAXN],L[MAXN][MAXN],R[MAXN][MAXN],U[MAXN][MAXN],D[MAXN][MAXN];
bool desc(pair<int,int> a,pair<int,int> b){
    if(a.first>b.first)
        return true;
    return false;
}

int co=0,n;
void calc(vector<vector<int> > &a,vector<vector<int> > vis,int x,int y){
    if(x==n-1 && y==n-1){
        co++;
        return ;
    }

    if(y+1<n && vis[x][y+1]==0 && a[x][y+1]==0){
        vis[x][y+1]=1;
        calc(a,vis,x,y+1);
    }
    if(y>1 && vis[x][y-1]==0 && a[x][y-1]==0){
        vis[x][y-1]=1;
        calc(a,vis,x,y-1);
    }
    if(x+1<n && vis[x+1][y]==0 && a[x+1][y]==0){
        vis[x+1][y]=1;
        calc(a,vis,x+1,y);
    }
    if(x>1 && vis[x-1][y]==0 && a[x-1][y]==0){
        vis[x-1][y]=1;
        calc(a,vis,x-1,y);
    }


}

int main()
{
    int i,j;
    cin>>n;
    vector<int> v;
    vector<vector<int> > a,vis;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            v.push_back(0);
        }
        a.push_back(v);
        vis.push_back(v);
        v.clear();
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            cin>>a[i][j];
            if(a[i][j]==1)
                vis[i][j]=1;
        }
    }
    vis[0][0]=1;
    calc(a,vis,0,0);
    cout<<co<<endl;
	return 0;
}
